entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Muskoka
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:37 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 2:13 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure: 98.9 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: SW 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
